faqs.q: Can I cancel my membership anytime?
faqs.a: Yes. Monthly memberships can be cancelled at any time with no cancellation fee. Your access continues until the end of the current billing period.

faqs.q: Do I need to book in advance, or can I walk in?
faqs.a: Members must reserve a court slot to guarantee availability — booking takes under 2 minutes via CourtReserve. Members get priority access to early and peak-hour slots.

faqs.q: What equipment is included in each session?
faqs.a: All self-practice sessions include the automatic ball machine and on-court video replay system. Balls are provided. You bring your own racket.
Day Pass and Monthly members can bring a guest by purchasing an additional Day Pass for them. Premium and Annual members each receive a monthly guest pass included in their plan.
